duties_responsibilities.duty: Solve technical problems and develop applicable documentation related to HVAC engineering.

Supervise all assigned resources to support projects in the shipyard, including system integration of ship electronics, communications, master control center operation, steering and propulsion electronics, power and lighting, and ship diagnostics.
Define, track, and control subcontractor activities.
Work independently to solve technical issues and plan, estimate, schedule, and monitor assigned work and resources.
Abide by and enforce all organizational policies and procedures, facilitate communications, interpret contract requirements, and prepare professional quality deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering or Mechanical Engineering Technology (Master's preferred)
